attributes.action: Give our troops the helicopters and equipment they require to achieve their mission in afghanistan without political Interference.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our heroic troops in Afghanistan are consistently faced with doing battle against insurgents and Taliban without the air support and equipment they need/deserve.  We have seen too many of our heroes killed or injured by cost cutting measures from our goverenment.  If we cannot afford the war, we should spend less on arts, culture and sports.  Enough is Enough, the best transport, equipment, weapons and armour should be made available to our troops regardless of political pressures.

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist, you may instead wish to add your name to http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EQUIPOURHEROES/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
